name: BUY ME GAME
description:
you now own a game store and you have to keep its alive as long as possible.

but its not that simpel.

YOU DONT HAVE TO BUY SUPPORT EDITION!

but you will give a littel new version.

Tutorial:

buy games then its random when it gets sold 

every 25 seconds you have to pay rent and your employees .

and there  is also thives in the game that are random.

the manager helps you get more money.

and the guard lowers the risk for thives 

THIS GAME IS IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT!

The other upload had a wierd bug.
